labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': [] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Κάτω Χώρες', 'Ισπανία', 'Μη κυκλικά καταναλωτικά αγαθά και υπηρεσίες', 'Κοινής ωφέλειας']
